module.name: dashproducts
module.description: Adds a block with a table of your latest orders and a ranking of your products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block with a table of your latest orders and a ranking of your products.

module.name: dashtrends
module.description: Adds a block with a graphical representation of the development of your store(s) based on selected key data
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block with a graphical representation of the development of your store(s) based on selected key data.

module.name: pagesnotfound
module.description: Adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found.

module.name: statsbestcategories

module.name: statsdata
module.description: This module must be enabled if you want to use statistics

module.description_full: This module must be enabled if you want to use statistics.

module.description: This is the main module for the Stats dashboard. It displays a summary of all your current statistics

module.description_full: This is the main module for the Stats dashboard. It displays a summary of all your current statistics.

module.description_full: Adds a list of customers and visitors who are currently online to the Stats dashboard.

module.name: onehopsmsservice
module.description: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop. Whether it's sending auto confirmation messages or keeping your customers posted on the delivery status, Onehop can help you improve your Customer Interaction using SMS. Experience the magic of SMS!
module.additional_description: Send Order Confirmation to buyers. Send Shipment Confirmation updates. Send Delivery Confirmation on delivery of the shipment. Send Out of Stock Product Alerts. Send Back in Stock Product Alerts.

module.name: googleshopping
module.description: Google Shopping helps businesses like you tap into the power of customer intent to reach the right people with relevant products ads, when it matters the most
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Google Shopping helps businesses like you tap into the power of customer intent to reach the right people with relevant products ads, when it matters the most.  With Google Shopping, increase your sales by at least 30% !
module.additional_description: With Google Shopping, put your product images, price, and business name right in front of people searching on Google, no matter what device they're using. Benefits:Increase visits to your shop being displayed among the 100 billions monthly Google searches Minimize workload and go-to-market time: Use the product information you already have in PrestaShop without needing to create separate files to submit to GoogleData accuracy: Continuously import fresh data from your store on PrestaShop without any additional workImprove conversion rate thanks to qualified Google trafic as well as your ranking in the search engine

module.name: lanavettepickup
module.displayName: la Navette Pickup: deliver your parcels in parcelshops
module.description: La Navette Pickup is a parcelshop to parcelshop delivery service developed by Pickup, filial of the Groupe La Poste, and France’s 1st parcelshop network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: La Navette Pickup is a parcelshop to parcelshop delivery service developed by Pickup, filial of the Groupe La Poste, and France’s 1st parcelshop network.This module enables you to have your parcels delivered in parcelshops in 48H from France.
module.additional_description: For your customers: ·        Economical: starting from 4,35€ (excl. Tax)·        Fast: 24/48h·        Safe: the recipient has to present and ID and sign to pick up the parcel.·        Tracking: track your parcel in real-time and the recipient is notified by SMS and email when upon delivery. For you: ·        Integrate our solution in a few clicks, with the help of our technical team if necessary·        A dynamic map of our Pickup parcelshops on your website·        Return to sender included (in case of refusal or no show of the recipient)·        A dedicated Customer Service·        Non-binding and no minimum volume or period
